apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the handshake emoji with medium and medium-light skin tones showcases a professional and harmonious connection.  The hands are depicted with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, creating a tactile sense of agreement and partnership.  The smooth, rounded edges of the fingers and palms give the impression of a firm yet friendly clasp, ideal for symbolizing trust, collaboration, and a successful deal in your digital interactions on Apple devices.
